caption.p: Thermal images illustrating (a) delineation of regions for thermal maxima analysis and (b)–(i) examples of maxima in human subjects. (a) Defined regions, (b) inner canthi, (c) oral (closed), (d) forehead (hairline), (e) temporal, (f) nasal, (g) neck, (h) other (outer canthus), and (i) other (cheek). Photo (a) is of author Q. Wang.
